name: Keep the Light (skempo74)
description:
Keep The Light is our 2021 Global Game Jam release, you take place in a special maze that will teleport you when your light turns out, so take care to keep your light alive if you don't want to become crazy.

Team:

Haris KACIMI () - 2D Artist

Mathys BOISSIERE (https://altario.itch.io) - Level Design / Build

Loïc POCHARD (https://elpochet.itch.io/) - Programmation

Adrien DELORME (Me) - Programmation
